key.name: location-mode
key.description: Controls whether the file chooser shows just a path bar, or a visible entry for the filename as well, for the benefit of typing-oriented users. The possible values for these modes are "path-bar" and "filename-entry".

key.name: show-hidden
key.description: Controls whether the file chooser shows hidden files or not.

key.name: sort-directories-first
key.description: If set to true, then folders are shown before files in the list.

key.name: expand-folders
key.description: This key is deprecated; do not use it.

key.name: show-size-column
key.description: Controls whether the file chooser shows a column with file sizes.

key.name: show-type-column
key.description: Controls whether the file chooser shows a column with file types.

key.name: sort-column
key.description: Can be one of "name", "modified", or "size". It controls which of the columns in the file chooser is used for sorting the list of files.

key.name: sort-order
key.description: Can be one of the strings "ascending" or "descending".

key.name: window-position
key.description: The (x, y) coordinates of the upper-left corner of the GtkFileChooserDialog's window.

key.name: window-size
key.description: The size (width, height) of the GtkFileChooserDialog's window, in pixels.

key.name: startup-mode
key.description: Either "recent" or "cwd"; controls whether the file chooser starts up showing the list of recently-used files, or the contents of the current working directory.

key.name: sidebar-width
key.description: Width in pixels of the file chooser's places sidebar.

key.name: clock-format
key.description: Whether the time is shown in 24h or 12h format.

key.name: date-format
key.description: The amount of detail to show in the Modified column.

key.name: type-format
key.description: Different ways to show the 'Type' column information. Example outputs for a video mp4 file: 'mime' -> 'video/mp4' 'description' -> 'MPEG-4 video' 'category' -> 'Video'
